item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 5/22/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Removed the deprecated Call Analysis tab. Fixed issue where outbound calls couldnâ€™t be canceled before being answered. Resolved issue where inbound calls did not trigger the dial pad. Adjusted height of the template editor. Fixed a bug where expired data caused call reception to fail. 5/15/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added detection for authorized recording devices when launching SeaX.
